name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-cohort-heatmap
description: Cohort heatmap MCP App Server for retention analysis

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && bun build server.ts --outdir dist --target node && bun build main.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node --banner '#!/usr/bin/env node' && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.start:http: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve:http
scripts.start:stdio: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve:stdio
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve:http'
